sentences.english: It was an adaptation of Wilson's cloud chamber, filled with nitrogen gas.
sentences.chinese: 這只是對威爾遜氮氣雲室的一種改進。
《威爾遜》是一部古怪的文獻片，於1944年公演。

sentences.english: Wilson holds a patent on this "Aspherical Propagation Delay" technique.
sentences.chinese: 威爾遜擁有專利的“非球面傳輸時延”技術。

sentences.english: The Oct. 2 stroke was not Wilson's first cerebral episode.
sentences.chinese: 10月2日的中風並非威爾遜的第一次腦血管意外。

sentences.english: Mr. Wilson isn't in one of his 'ho-ho-ho' moods today, is he?
sentences.chinese: 威爾遜先生今天怎麼不樂呵呵的了？

sentences.english: The thieves cased Wilson's house before the robbery.
sentences.chinese: 那些盜賊在搶劫前窺探了威爾遜的住宅。

sentences.english: I'd appreciate it if you didn't mention this to Mr. Wilson.
sentences.chinese: 如果您能不把這事告訴威爾遜先生，我會很感激您。

sentences.english: Has she ever mentioned a man named Buford Wilson?
sentences.chinese: 她可曾提過一個叫布福德。威爾遜的人？

sentences.english: Carter: In cars on Clarendon and Wilson Avenue.
sentences.chinese: 在卡拉倫登大道和威爾遜大道的車裏。

sentences.english: Billson and Wilson turned and stared at each other.
sentences.chinese: 比爾遜和威爾遜各自轉過臉來，四目相對。

sentences.english: The current barnburner in Washington is the Wilson investigation.
sentences.chinese: 當前華盛頓最熱鬧的話題是威爾遜一案的調查。

sentences.english: Wilson does more than argue for the rationality of such behaviors.
sentences.chinese: 威爾遜不僅討論了這些行爲合理與否。

sentences.english: Yes, just follow the porter, Mr. Wilson.
sentences.chinese: 可以，威爾遜先生，跟行李員上去吧。

sentences.english: You any kin to the Wilsons over on Balsum Mountain?
sentences.chinese: 你是大霧山威爾遜的什麼親戚嗎？

sentences.english: Hubble left the Mount Wilson Observatory during World War Two.
sentences.chinese: 哈勃於二戰中離開威爾遜山天文臺的職位。

definition: variant of 邱吉爾|邱吉尔[Qiu1 ji2 er3]
Rhode Island, US state/Rhodes, an island of Greece
Kohl (name)/Helmut Kohl (1930-2017), German CDU politician, Chancellor 1982-1998
